mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inoilcheckbill( vouchno,oilno ,goodsbillno,origamount,origstdliter, origlitramout,pickupplace,checamount,checcnttemper, checoiwahigh,checairhigh,checwatehigh,checlitramount,checstdliter, deinvolu,deinanalyse,shipdept,chiptrucno,vittaperson,driver,arrivetime, acceptflag,operatorcode,billstatus,transflag,oilcanno ) values(#{vouchno}, #{oilno}, #{goodsbillno}, #{origamount}, #{origstdliter}, #{origlitramout}, #{pickupplace}, #{checamount}, #{checcnttemper}, #{checoiwahigh}, #{checairhigh}, #{checwatehigh}, #{checlitramount}, #{checstdliter}, #{ deinvolu}, #{deinanalyse}, #{shipdept}, #{chiptrucno}, #{vittaperson}, #{driver}, #{arrivetime}, #{acceptflag}, #{operatorcode}, #{billstatus}, #{transflag}, #{oilcanno} )
mapper.update: update inoilcheckbill set billstatus=1 where goodsbillno=#{DeliveryNo}
update inoilcheckbill set goodsbillno=#{manualno} where goodsbillno=#{DeliveryNo}
